Title: The Age of Mortals
Description:
Once again, the mortal races have come together to defend a World Tree. It is only fitting then that we bolster their efforts with a relic from that past battle. The Horn of Cenarius.

I entrust the horn to you, $n. Use it to bestow the blessings of Cenarius to our allies. With luck, it will allow us to break through Fyrakk's forces and open a path to the temple.

And do not forget to lend your strength as well. Every enemy felled is one fewer between us and Fyrakk.
ObjectivesText: Blow the Horn of Cenarius while next to heroes of Azeroth and slay Fyrakk's forces.

Objectives.Text: Empower heroes and slay enemies on the Field of Flames
